publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2252 Pauline McNeill: Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan—That the Parliament notes the employment tribunal decision in the case of O’Donovan v Central College of Commerce to order the reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan by 31 January 2005 and believes that this ruling should be adhered to by the Central College of Commerce immediately and that it is in the public interest for this dispute to end as soon as possible so that all parties involved can rebuild relationships between management and staff in the interests of further education generally. Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Janis Hughes*, Bill Butler*, Elaine Smith*, Gordon Jackson*, Mike Watson*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Christine May*

S2M-2252 Pauline McNeill: Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan—That the Parliament notes the employment tribunal decision in the case of O’Donovan v Central College of Commerce to order the reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan by 31 January 2005 and believes that this ruling should be adhered to by the Central College of Commerce immediately and that it is in the public interest for this dispute to end as soon as possible so that all parties involved can rebuild relationships between management and staff in the interests of further education generally. Supported by: Marlyn Glen, Dr Elaine Murray, Mr Frank McAveety, Janis Hughes, Bill Butler, Elaine Smith, Gordon Jackson, Mike Watson, Marilyn Livingstone, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Christine May, Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Des McNulty*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Michael McMahon*, Alex Neil*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Bristow Muldoon*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Frances Curran*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Trish Godman*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Sarah Boyack*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Robin Harper*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-2252 Reinstatement of Jim O’Donovan (lodged on 13 January 2005) John Swinburne*
